column4: 1364 people all wanting help. I'd hate to be paid to provide support here lol
It's not quite like that. It's called help and be helped. I ask questions all the time, and answer them all the time. Share what you know and ask what you don't.
It's almost like a wiki, except real-time.
Seems like it would be difficult to keep up with this though. People are just joining and firing questions faster than I can focus on just one
